name: Abyss Greatsword
text: +1 damage if you have an Ember token.

attacks.text: All characters within range gain 4 health.

name: Greatshield of Artorias
text: You are immune to Bleed and Poison.

name: Lifehunt Scythe
attacks.text: After you attack with this weapon, you suffer Bleed.

name: Blinding Bolt
attacks.text: All 5 attacks must target enemies in the same node.

name: Manus Catalyst
attacks.text: Your magic attacks cost +1 stamina but gain 1 black die.
All 5 attacks must target the same enemy.

name: Sanctus
text: At the start of your activation, gain 1 health.

attacks.text: Choose an enemy in a node with another enemy; the chosen enemy suffers 3 damage.
